channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15958] Implement ClaimQueues on top of HBase
item.description: Building on HBase-15883. Now implementing the claim queues procedure within an HBase table. Peer tracking will still be performed by ZooKeeper though. Revision at https://reviews.apache.org/r/48232/
item.summary: Implement ClaimQueues on top of HBase

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
